text: Philip Breno (born December 11, 1995) is an American soccer player who currently plays for Charleston Battery in the USL Championship. ==Career== Breno began playing college soccer at the University of Maryland, Baltimore County in 2013,https://www.umbcretrievers.com/sports/msoc/2015-16/bios/breno_phil_p21c?view=bio before transferring to the College of William & Mary in 2016 where he played for two further years. During and immediately after college, Breno also appeared for National Premier Soccer League side FC Frederick between 2015 and 2018.https://www.npsl.com/8759/ On March 8, 2019, Breno joined USL Championship side Charleston Battery. He made his professional debut on August 14, 2019, start in a 2-1 win over Loudoun United. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:UMBC Retrievers men's soccer players Category:William & Mary Tribe men's soccer players Category:Charleston Battery players Category:Soccer players from Maryland Category:National Premier Soccer League players Category:USL Championship players Category:People from Mount Airy, Maryland
title: Phil Breno
